page.title: 05********Junior Church*******
page.content:
Junior church is fun. One night we played pass the banana. Junior church is on Tuesday. You don't have to pay but some people do,I dont. My sister is a monitor she hands out the hymn books,lights the candles and reads stories to the young ones.
Sunday School is held in Somerby methodist chapel. A few weeks ago we were practicing for the Anniversary. Some grown ups were watching us, we sang "Silver and gold Ihave none" and "Bind us together lord".
Written by Clive Rowley aged 8 yrs
